1.0.name: wordpress/kameleoon
1.0.description: Kameleoon is a web design tool that allows you to instantly modify the visual appearance of your blog (or other website). Thanks to its easy yet powerful GUI, you can author beautiful and professional looking themes - without knowing CSS or HTML. Kameleoon is compatible with all WordPress templates, which means you can install a template and further customize it to your tastes. However, we maintain a collection of recommanded templates (templates that have been analyzed and slightly modified by our team to guarantee you a full compatibility). Use one of these if you run into troubles with your own template (or contact us so we can port your template to Kameleoon).
